item.title: Performance - the one feature that you need to do early.
item.author: contact@atishay.me (Atishay Jain)
item.description: Unless you can hire an army of highly paid experts to support your trillion dollar business empire (cough Chrome), performance is one feature that cannot built as a feature. Performance is a mindset, a way of living, a choice that needs a decision very early in a product life cycle. Once the foundation is ready, and a palace built on those foundations, you cannot dig them out and live in the palace at the same time.
